NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IUpdateDownloader
public interface
NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IUpdateDownloader
NetSparkleUpdater.​Downloaders.​WebClientFileDownloader

Interface for objects that can download (or otherwise obtain) update files for a given AppCastItem. These objects should send back progress updates and handle other exceptions or other event changes as necessary.

Properties
IsDownloading
bool IsDownloading { get }

Return true if the update downloader is currently downloading the update

Events
DownloadProgressChanged
event DownloadProgressEvent DownloadProgressChanged

Event to call when some progress has been made on the download

DownloadFileCompleted
event AsyncCompletedEventHandler DownloadFileCompleted

Event to call when the download of the update file has been completed

Functions
StartFileDownload
void StartFileDownload(
Uri uri,
string downloadFilePath
)

Start the download of the file. The file download should be asynchronous!

Parameters
uri
Uri

URL for the download

downloadFilePath
string

Where to download the file

CancelDownload
void CancelDownload()

Cancel the download.

Dispose
void Dispose()

Clean up and dispose of anything that has to be disposed of (cancel the download if needed, etc.)

RetrieveDestinationFileNameAsync
Task<string> RetrieveDestinationFileNameAsync(
AppCastItem item
)

Retrieve the download file name of the app cast item from the server.  This is useful if the server has any sort of redirects that take place when starting the download process. The client will use this file name when saving the file on disk.  NetSparkle.CheckServerFileName = false can be set to avoid this call.

Parameter
item
AppCastItem

The AppCastItem that will be downloaded

Returns

The file name of the file to download from the server (including file extension). Null if not found/had error/not applicable.
